rows.Name: MAX_SUBPROGRAMS
rows.Comment:
The maximum number of subprograms supported bySMC_ReadNCFile2.
Increase this value if you get the error SMC_PRS_TOO_MANY_SUBPROGRAMS.

rows:
The maximum number of CNC subprograms parameters and local variables
supported bySMC_ReadNCFile2andSMC_ReadNCFromStream.
Increase this value if you get the error
SMC_PRS_TOO_MANY_SUBPROGRAM_PARAMETERS or
SMC_PRS_TOO_MANY_LOCAL_VARIABLES.

The maximum nesting depth for CNC subprogram calls.
Increase this value if you get the error
SMC_NAV_MAX_SUBPROGRAM_NESTING_EXCEEDED.

The size of the evaluation stack for expressions in|SMC_NC_Interpreter|.
Increase this value if you get the error SMC_IPR_EVAL_STACK_OVERFLOW.

The maximum number of G-Words supported for one sentence.
Increase this value if you get the error SMC_RNCF_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL.

The size of the G-Code sentence jump buffer.
Increase this value if the performance of G-Code jumps (G20) is
poor.
